Text: Dean Goss:  His first announcing role was in 1985, on the second season of the 1984-86 version of "Let's Make a Deal" (known as "The All New Let's Make a Deal"), where he succeeded voice actor Brian Cummings as the show's second announcer.
Triplets:<Dean Goss
4:
--------------------
Text: Dean Goss:  Other game shows for which he has announced include "Bargain Hunters" and the Wink Martindale-hosted version of "High Rollers" both from 1987, as well as NBC's "I'm Telling!
